PvP: Hammer Forged/Polygonal/Smallbore + Accurized + Killing Wind/Quickdraw/Firmly Planted + Headseeker/Kill Clip/Moving Target

Pulses do appear to be range capped, so like Cold Denial, it’s best to focus on stability if you get Killing Wind since KW adds +20 range, + 50 mobility, and +~40  handling. This pulse has standard zoom and iron sights like those on Redrix.

PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Surplus/Clown Cartridge/ALH/Triple Tap + Demo/HIR/Vorpal

PvP: Hammer/Fluted/Arrowhead Brake + Accurized + Firmly Planted/Moving Target/Killing Wind/No Distractions + Snapshot/Quickdraw/Opening Shot/KC/MKC

This sniper has some interesting rolls. With KC and MKC it can get ohk body shots, and Vorpal makes it one of the ways to counter a behemoth super. However, these all roll in the same slot as the handling perks, so you are giving up better ads and feel for these build perks
